Over the years, I've used several artists' work as profile icons or avatars. The ones I've retired, I would like to credit here, since I gave them so little credit while I used them.

  • Chet Zar - Mourner
  • Chet Zar - Wish You Were Here
  • Pablo Palazuelo - Monroy
  • Pablo Palazuelo - Monroy 2
  • Rene Magritte - Not To Be Reproduced (Portrait of Edward James)
  • Rene Magritte - Les Amonts
  • Kris Kuksi - With Reverence
  • Vaily Kafanov - On Black
  • Anatoly Fomenko - Branched Coverings
  • Shephard Fairey - Eye For Sale
  • Shuyler Beecroft - Touching Base
  • Shawn Huckins - George Washington
